text: "Turn to Me", is a song by Australian singer-songwriter, Vanessa Amorosi, released in December 2001 as the lead single from her second album, Turn to Me. The song peaked at number 80 on the ARIA singles chart. == Track listing == ; CD single # "Turn to Me" (Single Version) \- 3:36 # "Turn to Me" (Alternative Version) \- 3:37 # "Turn to Me" (Extended Version) \- 5:34 # "Turn to Me" (Animated Video Clip) \- 3:43 ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" !Chart (2001) !Peak position |- |Australian ARIA Singles Chart |align="center"|80 |- |Australian Artists singles Chart |align="center"|11 |- |} ==Release history== {|class="wikitable" !
